subtitle: A three layer cheesecake finished off with thin strips of lemon rind and a dusting of cocoa powder.

method.text: Preheat oven to 160°C. Line an 18-20 cm / 7-8 in loose-bottomed cake tin.
In a bowl, mix the base ingredients together and spoon into the tin to cover the base.
For the filling, heat the cream over a gentle heat. Take off the heat and stir in the chocolate. Leave to cool.
When cool, mix all the topping ingredients together and pour over the cheesecake. Leave to set. Decorate with a little sifted cocoa powder and lemon rind .

Beat together the cream cheese, sugar, grated rind from 1 lemon, juice from 2 lemons and vanilla essencet. Beat in the eggs and cornflour. Pour mixture into the tin. Bake for about 1 <sup>1</sup>/<sub>4</sub> hours. Turn oven off and cool in the oven.

title: Italian chocolate cheesecake
